assessment.title: Match Features to Wants Game - Buick
assessment.introText:
With all the questions, play with these assumptions:

  • Most recent model year
  • Lowest trim level
  • No dealer or factory incentives
  • All seats up for trunk/cargo space

Try to get all 10 right! Then come back and play again. The questions and answers will change!

Click NEXT to begin.

question.questionBody: The customer wants the vehicle with the best combined gas mileage. Which vehicle would you recommend?
The customer wants the vehicle with the most interior cabin space. Which vehicle would you recommend?
The customer wants the vehicle with the biggest trunk. Which vehicle would you recommend?
The customer wants the vehicle with the lowest base price. Which vehicle would you recommend? (Note: Assume lowest trim level and no dealer/factory incentives.)
The customer wants the vehicle with the most horsepower. Which vehicle would you recommend?
The customer wants a vehicle with good horsepower but is more concerned with fuel efficiency. Which vehicle would you recommend?

The customer is a real estate agent, and she needs a vehicle that looks great. However, she often needs to haul signs and other items, which means she needs the most cargo space available. Which vehicle would you recommend?
The customer wants a sleek vehicle that will turn heads but he is more concerned about the price. Which vehicle would you recommend?
The customer mentions she often likes to travel to local state parks to go mountain biking. Which vehicle with the most cargo space would you recommend?
The customer has children and needs a vehicle that has the most leg room. Which vehicle would you recommend?
